bropals.lib.simplegame.gui

Class GuiProgressBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • bropals.lib.simplegame.gui.GuiElement
      • bropals.lib.simplegame.gui.GuiProgressBar

  • public class GuiProgressBar
extends GuiElement
    Implements a simple progress bar.

        x - the x position of the element
        y - the y position of the element
        w - the width of the element
        h - the height of the element
        value - the initial progress value
        maxValue - the maximum progress value
